Html:
Hello.

I have a logitech orbit webcam that can capture HIGH RES Image, but, usign touchless, the max resolution is 640*480. If possible to change this?.

Thanks.

I'm using the latest build and the resolution seems to be fixed at 320x240.  The imagebox is 640x480 but the actual image returned in OnImageCaptured (_latestFrame = frame.Image) is 320X240.

The following post shows how to change the resolution, but I don't know where to get the pin parameter from:

http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/forums/en-US/windowsdirectshowdevelopment/thread/fa127dc1-71f8-41d6-89bf-eddc96699dad
